mapper.insert: insert into user_membership (login_name, membership_id, expired_time, created_time, type) value(#{loginName}, #{membershipId}, #{expiredTime}, #{createdTime}, #{type})
mapper.update: update user_membership set login_name = #{loginName}, membership_id = #{membershipId}, expired_time = #{expiredTime}, expired_time = #{createdTime}, type = #{type} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user_membership where login_name = #{loginName} and expired_time > now() order by created_time desc limit 1
select m.fee from user_membership um join membership m on um.membership_id = m.id where um.login_name = #{loginName} and um.expired_time > now() order by um.created_time desc limit 1

select m.level from user_membership um join membership m on um.membership_id = m.id where um.login_name = #{loginName} and um.expired_time > now() and um.type = 'UPGRADE' order by um.created_time desc limit 1
select membership_point from account where login_name = #{loginName}
